amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to reduce funding for the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Environmental Programs and Management account by $7 million and redirect $5 million to the EPA OIG for increased oversight of the EPA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
